data.eml:eml: New genera and new species of the family Linyphiidae from Borneo, Sumatra and Java (Arachnida, Araneae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tanasevitch, Andrei V. (2017): New genera and new species of the family Linyphiidae from Borneo, Sumatra and Java (Arachnida, Araneae). Revue suisse de Zoologie 124 (1): 141-155, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.322672
